Mercury.title: Project 1: The Starter
Mercury.short: A brief description of your first project.
Mercury.long: This is a detailed description of your first project. Explain the technologies used, the challenges you faced, and the solutions you implemented. This is your chance to show off your coding skills.

Venus.title: Project 2: Design Focus
Venus.short: A project that highlights your design skills.
Venus.long: Describe a project where you focused on UI/UX design. Mention any design systems or frameworks you used. Explain your design process and how you iterated on the user experience.

Earth.title: About Me
Earth.long: This is the main section about you. Write a bio that highlights your experience, skills, and passion for development. Include your contact information here as well.

Mars.title: Project 3: Technical Deep Dive
Mars.short: A complex technical challenge you solved.
Mars.long: Detail a project where you tackled a difficult technical problem. Explain the architecture, the algorithms, or the optimization techniques you used.

Jupiter.title: Project 4: The Big One
Jupiter.short: Your most significant project to date.
Jupiter.long: This is your flagship project. Describe its scope, the team you worked with (if any), and the impact it had. This should be the project you are most proud of.

Saturn.title: Project 5: Creative Experiment
Saturn.long: Showcase a creative coding experiment, a game, or a side project that shows your personality and willingness to learn new things.
